title: Classify Emails & Extract Structured Data from Job Applications with GPT-4o
author: Sleak
readme:
## Who is this template for?

This workflow template is designed for business owners and HR professionals to automatically detect and structure unstructured job applications received through email. Additionally, other email categories can be added, each with it's own workflow.

## How it works

  * Every time a new email is received, an OpenAI model classifies it into a predefined category by analyzing the plain text of the email and the extracted content from the attachment.
  * If the email is classified as a job application, an OpenAI model uses the email’s plain text and extracted attachment content to populate predefined fields such as age and study.
  * A relevant additional step would be to directly push the applicant and their structured job application into a CRM or ATS like Hubspot or Recruitee.



## Set up steps

  1. Configure your IMAP credentials to connect your email account. Use [this n8n documentation page](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/imap/#related-resources) for quickstart guides for common email providers.

  2. Connect your OpenAI account in the _'Classify email'_ node.

     * And add or remove any category for classification in this node. Make sure the description is clear and concise.

![Scherm­afbeelding 20250409 om 11.51.52.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Scherm_afbeelding_2025_04_09_om_11_51_52_95e42c7609.png)

  3. Connect your OpenAI account in the _'Extract variables - email & attachment'_ node.

     * And add or remove any predefined fields that should be populated for job applications in this node. Make sure the description is clear and concise.

![Scherm­afbeelding 20250409 om 11.54.48.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Scherm_afbeelding_2025_04_09_om_11_54_48_87f857057f.png)![Scherm­afbeelding 20250409 om 11.51.52.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Scherm_afbeelding_2025_04_09_om_11_51_52_95e42c7609.png)
readme_zh:
## 模板适用对象

本工作流模板专为企业主和人力资源专业人士设计，用于自动识别并结构化处理通过电子邮件接收的非结构化求职申请。此外，还可添加其他邮件分类，并为每类邮件配置独立的工作流程。

## 运作原理

  * 每当收到新邮件时，OpenAI模型会通过分析邮件纯文本及附件提取内容，将其归类至预设类别
  * 若邮件被识别为求职申请，OpenAI模型将利用邮件正文及附件内容自动填充预设字段（如年龄、学历等）
  * 推荐后续操作：将结构化处理的申请人信息直接推送至Hubspot或Recruitee等CRM/ATS系统

## 配置步骤

  1. 配置IMAP凭证以连接邮箱账户。参考[n8n官方文档](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/imap/#related-resources)获取常见邮箱服务商的快速指南

  2. 在_"邮件分类"_节点中关联您的OpenAI账户：
     * 可在此节点增删分类类别，确保分类描述清晰准确

![2025年4月9日11.51.52界面截图.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Scherm_afbeelding_2025_04_09_om_11_51_52_95e42c7609.png)

  3. 在_"字段提取-邮件及附件"_节点中关联您的OpenAI账户：
     * 可在此节点增删求职申请需要填充的预设字段，确保字段描述清晰准确

![2025年4月9日11.54.48界面截图.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Scherm_afbeelding_2025_04_09_om_11_54_48_87f857057f.png)![2025年4月9日11.51.52界面截图.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Scherm_afbeelding_2025_04_09_om_11_51_52_95e42c7609.png)
title_zh: 使用GPT-4o分类邮件并从求职申请中提取结构化数据
